thread.title: Shah Rukh Khan, Sonam Kapoor fly to Dubai together
thread.title_full: Shah Rukh Khan, Sonam Kapoor fly to Dubai together

title: Shah Rukh Khan, Sonam Kapoor fly to Dubai together
text:
Shah Rukh Khan, Sonam Kapoor fly to Dubai together Web Team   | Last updated on February 24, 2017 at 01.51 pm Share 
(Instagram) Wouldn't it be good to see the duo together in a Dubai tourism campaign? Sonam Kapoor shared a picture of her bumping into Shah Rukh Khan in the flight on her way to Dubai. An excited Sonam Kapoor who has been hinting about working with King Khan posted, "Look who's on flight with me" Haha!" The picture has further sparked speculation about the two acting together in Anand L Rai's next film. Expressing her desire to work with him, Sonam had in an interview to Filmfare said, "I don't think Shah Rukh Khan wants to work with me. There have been so many opportunities where I could have worked with him but he'I wanted to work with him and I reached out to him as well. But I never got the opportunity. I guess it'll happen whenever he feels like working with me." A post shared by Pinkvilla (@pinkvilla) on Feb 23, 2017 at 6:56am PST Sonam is in Dubai to shoot for a Kalyan Jewellers campaign. She will also be addressing the press at an event in J W Marriott Marquis, Business Bay at 4.30 pm. A post shared by sonamkapoor (@sonamkapoor) on Feb 23, 2017 at 11:46pm PST Considering Shah Rukh Khan had featured in the much-publicised campaign for Dubai #BeMyGuest, wouldn't it be good to see the duo come together for a tourism campaign? Is anybody listening? Share
